text.section: Each bicounty commission shall adopt regulations relating to financial disclosure by its employees.

The regulations required by this section:
shall be substantially similar to the State financial disclosure provisions of Subtitle 6 of this title; and
may not conflict with the financial disclosure provisions for commissioners and applicants specified in §§ 15-820 through 15-824 of this subtitle.

Each bicounty commission shall submit the regulations adopted under this section, and any amendments to the regulations, to:
the Ethics Commission; and
the governing body of each county in which the bicounty commission conducts its operations.
